verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: announced] [ARG1: the US government 's withdrawal from the Iran deal] , [ARGM-ADV: marking one of the biggest foreign - policy decisions of his tenure]
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Tuesday announced the US government 's withdrawal from the Iran deal , [V: marking] [ARG1: one of the biggest foreign - policy decisions of his tenure]
